Welcome CV Research Now Say Hi

Say Hi

This is a small website, with very few things on it. If for some reason you ended up here, we’d probably have an interesting conversation and you should say hi. You can reach me by email at jablevine@gmail.com or put some time on my Calendly. I am very good at responding to email, but I only check my inbox at 7am and 6pm; if I haven’t replied within 36 hours, you should follow up, repeatedly.

I have shamelessly copied this gimmick from Ben Kuhn.


Say Hi - Joseph Levine
